description: Height vision pi config json schema

x.description: Horizontal resolution of the camera in pixels

y.description: Vertical resolution of the camera in pixels

fps.description: Frames per second that the camera should capture

brightness.description: Brightness level of the camera image, from 0 (darkest) to 1 (brightest)

contrast.description: Contrast level of the camera image, from 0 (low contrast) to 1 (high contrast)

saturation.description: Saturation level of the camera image, from 0 (grayscale) to 1 (fully saturated)

auto_exposure.description: Enable or disable automatic exposure adjustment
